#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int lastDigitOfSum(long long a){
	int sum = 0;
	while(a){
		int digit = a%10;
		if(digit & 1)sum += digit;
		else sum += 2*digit;
		a /= 10;
	}
	return sum%10;
}
long long find(long long a){
	if(a == 0)return 0;
	if(a%10 == 0)return (a*45/10);
	return find(a-1) + lastDigitOfSum(a-1);
}
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long a, b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		cout<<find(b+1) - find(a)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
